entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, who is trying to cast a spell to protect himself and Hermione from dementors.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend, who tries to help him cast the patronus charm but fails.

entities.name: black
entities.description: Black is Harry's godfather, whom he is going to live with. He is mentioned as being pale and motionless on the ground.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are dark creatures that are closing in on Harry and Hermione, forming a solid wall around them.

relationships.description: Harry is going to live with his godfather Black. This relationship is mentioned in the text as 'I'm going to go and live with him'.
Harry and Hermione are friends, who are trying to cast the patronus charm together. This relationship is mentioned in the text as 'Hermione, help me!'
Harry and Hermione are being threatened by dementors, who are closing in on them. This relationship is mentioned in the text as 'The dementors were closing in...'
Hermione is also being threatened by dementors, who are closing in on her and Harry. This relationship is mentioned in the text as 'The dementors were closing in...'
